ygData.subject: Re: some encouragement  for a humble newb
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No need to feel awe or intimidated. It s only a video game. Secondly, the game is very simple to grasp. All you need are three things, 1) common sense, 2)
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "indeo" <excelsis46@h...> wrote:
> Hi
> As a newb, its hard not to feel a little intimidated by the
> discussions here. I am in AWE of you people even though I don't
> understand half of what you say. I long for the day when I can talk
> about the finer ponts of EQ like you guys.
>


No need to feel awe or intimidated. It's only a video game.

Secondly, the game is very simple to grasp. All you need are three
things, 1) common sense, 2) patience, and 3) being resourceful.

Nowadays, the only "finer" points of EQ discussion is how so-and-so
mob in PoP was done completely wrong, or how incredibly weak the
items were when they killed it. Hardly awe-inspiring.
